Detailed Description

analysis of molecular simulations in python

MD is a python toolkit to analyze molecular dynamics trajectories in xyz format.

It allows one to read molecular dynamics trajectories and access the atomic coordinates through numpy arrays. This provides a flexible and relatively fast framework for complex analysis tasks.

Citation -------- When using MD in published work, please cite Knorowski, C. Thanks!

Dependecies: --------------- numpy, scipy, matplotlib, python > 2.4 but not 3.0+

Getting started ---------------

Import the package::

>>> import MD

Examples --------

see dna_scripts
